existing_features.title: Update the existing toggle switch labeled “Show Physician Signature Fields” on the Resident Profile page so that only the switch knob (thumb) changes color: white when ON/checked and green when OFF/unchecked. Do not change the label/text colors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update 'Show Physician Signature Fields' toggle styling so the knob is white when ON and green when OFF (no label/text color changes)

projectName: Update “Show Physician Signature Fields” switch knob colors (ON white, OFF green)
